## PickerBaseComponent.setMinValue() method

Sets minimal possible value for picker, that can be picked

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | TDate \| null | Minimal possible value that can be picked |
